header_text: You are on a long train ride and really hit it off with a person sitting next to you. As the train ride nears an end, you think about how you would really like to see this person again but are unsure if they'll think you're being too forward. When you consider asking the other passenger out on a date, you are fairly sure this person will accept.

elements.Text: If you ask the other person to coffee, the other passenger will probably...
